casebody.data:
MAYFIELD
v.
HANNIFIN, et al. No. 699P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 20, 2005. Matthew D. Glidewell, Charlotte, M. Duane Jones, for Parker Hannifin. Linda Hartwell, Kathleen Sumner, Greensboro, for Willie Mayfield.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of December 2005 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of December 2005."
